display.title: Looting Structures
description: Everyone now has a chance to get the same loot!
Tired of villages being completely ransacked by other players?
Struggling to find loot that hasnt been taken?
Look no further than the Lootr mod!
With the Lootr mod, &&6every loot chest/barrel has its own inventory per player!&&r

subtitle.text: Everyone now has a chance to get the same loot!
